code: import React from'react';import'./NotificationContainer.css';import{useNotification}from'../../contexts/NotificationContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotificationContainer=()=>{const{notifications,closeNotification}=useNotification();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notifications-container",children:notifications.map(notification=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`notification notification-${notification.type}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notification-icon",children:[notification.type==='info'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-info-circle"}),notification.type==='success'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-check-circle"}),notification.type==='error'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-exclamation-circle"}),notification.type==='warning'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-exclamation-triangle"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notification-message",children:notification.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"notification-close",onClick:()=>closeNotification(notification.id),children:"\xD7"})]},notification.id))});};export default NotificationContainer;
